text:
If Corbyn had won last year, I believe two things.

1) Our Covid-19 death toll would be lower (based on his politics and similar outcomes internationally)

2) Corbyn would have been personally blamed for every single death by our press - every day - for years.

I'm not wrong. 🤷‍♂️
